review_title: It's ok if you cannot find anything else better that accommodate your life schedule
pros: Family-like environment, able to coordinate my schedule as per comp time, and peaceful. My direct supervisor is a FIVE START!

job_title: Licensed Social Worker in New York, NY
pros: Excellent benefits. 1199 is an amazing Union who will fight to protect you from Management. Coworkers who are like family. Parking lots are on site, and secure.
cons:
If you’re looking for an abusive level of disrespect, this is the place for you. Management consists of a group of people who aren’t Clinical, who lack the education and experience to successfully run a Behavioral Health program, and who loudly believe themselves to be the smartest people in the room. 
Under their “stewardship” the Rehab Units have become a dysfunctional revolving door where nobody receives treatment, and one Unit in particular became a “motel” where women patients are regularly exposed to sexual abuse. 
There is a mass exodus of Staff happening because of how toxic the program (read: Management) has become, and people have left after 3 months…one Social Worker left after 2 weeks. It’s so bad they’re now pressing folks in their outpatient to work on their Rehab and Detox units…and even that hasn’t shown them the value of treating their staff with respect. 
The benefits may be amazing but you’ll never get to use them, because there’s nobody to cover you after Management fired the bulk of the Per Diem pool…and if you wanna work Per Diem, get ready to be used as a full time Counselor without the benefits, training, and support.
